segments.text: Ugh, what a disgusting mess with water spilling all over the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just pouring out, and that puddle is spreading like a gross flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch—how nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinet doors are dripping wet; it'll ruin the wood with all that moisture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids climbing around in this slop; they'll track it everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies while the place turns into a swamp—irresponsible and filthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed in the water; it's a recipe for slipping and more mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is clean and pretty, making the inside look even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, probably covered in splashes soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar in an open cabinet—now crumbs will mix with the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a domestic space turn chaotic and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up before it gets truly revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene makes my skin crawl.
segments.speaker: PAR
